name: Long Sword
description: A sturdy steel sword ideal for melee combat.

name: Leather Armor
description: Light armor made from tough leather, offering basic protection.

name: Healing Potion
description: A potion that instantly heals the user.

name: Scroll of Fireball
description: A magical scroll that casts a powerful fireball.

name: Pickaxe
description: A tool used for mining rocks and minerals.

name: Gold Coin
description: A shiny gold coin used as currency.

name: Leather Backpack
description: A sturdy backpack for carrying items.

name: Ancient Relic
description: A unique relic required to complete a quest.

name: Dragon Scale Shield
description: A shield made from dragon scales, offering high resistance to fire.

name: Elven Bow
description: A finely crafted bow with superior range and accuracy.

name: Ring of Invisibility
description: A magical ring that grants temporary invisibility.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A tool used for catching fish.

name: Jewel of the Nile
description: A rare and valuable jewel, highly sought after by collectors.

name: Iron Chest
description: A heavy chest for storing valuable items. Requires a key to open.

name: Enchanted Scroll
description: A scroll with magical properties, essential for completing a quest.

name: Thunder Hammer
description: A massive hammer that delivers thunderous blows.

name: Mithril Helmet
description: A lightweight yet incredibly durable helmet made of mithril.

name: Orb of Mana
description: A magical orb that restores mana over time.

name: Strength Elixir
description: An elixir that temporarily boosts strength.

name: Silver Goblet
description: An ornate goblet made of pure silver.
